name: github-curl
readme:
github api via curl (~/.githubtoken required)

#### Install `npm install -g github-curl` #### Usage **github-curl** ```shell usage: github-curl [options] url options same as curl options url - https://api.github.com/ $ github-curl https://api.github.com/ # test $ github-curl -D /dev/null https://api.github.com/ # body (json) only $ github-curl -o /dev/null https://api.github.com/ # headers only ``` +2 additional scripts (with same syntax): * **github-curl-headers** - headers only * **github-curl-body** - body (json) only **~/.githubtoken** required [Examples/](https://github.com/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli/tree/master/Examples) Sources: * [scripts/github-curl](https://github.com/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli/blob/master/scripts/github-curl) * [scripts/github-curl-headers](https://github.com/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli/blob/master/scripts/github-curl-headers) * [scripts/github-curl-body](https://github.com/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli/blob/master/scripts/github-curl-body) ### Links * cURL man page - [curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html](https://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html) * Creating an access token - [help.github.com/articles/creating-an-access-token-for-command-line-use/](https://help.github.com/articles/creating-an-access-token-for-command-line-use/) * GitHub API - [developer.github.com/v3/](https://developer.github.com/v3/) Feedback [![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli.svg)](https://github.com/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli/issues) [![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli](https://badges.gitter.im/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli.svg)](https://gitter.im/russianidiot/github-curl.sh.cli) [![GitHub followers](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/russianidiot.svg?style=social&label=Follow)](https://github.com/russianidiot) * * *

cli packages russianidiot.github.io/cli/

repos list russianidiot.github.io
